name: Simple scheduling
description: Light week with 5 existing meetings. Schedule 3 focus blocks.

task_prompt: I have a light week Jan 20-24, 2025. I need to schedule 3 one-hour focus blocks for deep work. Please find good slots that don't conflict with my existing meetings. Please ensure at least 15 minutes of travel time on each side of every block. Working hours are 9am-5pm UTC.

custom_rules.description: 15-min travel time buffer between focus blocks and other events
